settings.title: Skirack features a full Bike Service Department. We work on most makes and models. Whether you need a simple flat fix or a full suspension overhaul, we are ready to help! Check out a sampling of our services below and call or stop-in today!

settings.text:
• We'd love to see your bike to offer a complimentary estimate. Stop by during our business hours (listed below).
  • Turnaround times for service can vary.
  • Service appointments are available. Please note: a deposit for $50 is required. For service orders where $50 is more than half of the total bill then only a $25 deposit is required.
  • You are welcome to use our free parking out back.
  • Late Pick-up Fee: $25 storage fee will be applied to the order if the bike is left in our shop longer than 14 days after work is completed by the technician.
  • E-Bike Policy: Due to increased awareness surrounding e-bike safety, we can only work on e-bikes from brands we sell or have direct access to necessary support services. This includes Specialized, Cannondale, Santa Cruz/Juliana, Cervelo, Scott, Kona and RAD Power Bikes.

settings.custom_liquid:
Bike Tune Packages

Complimentary
Service Estimate		 This service can take up to 15 minutes or more. We explain and discuss the options. You choose the level of performance to meet your needs. FREE
 
Safety Check

Inspect the frame and all components to ensure the bike is operating correctly and safely. Make minor adjustments as needed with the brakes and derailleurs. Check tire pressures, lube the chain and torque all stem bolts to spec. Wipe down the frame to finish.

 $50.00
Standard Tune

Check and adjust all primary components of your bike, including the brakes and derailleurs. Remove and true both wheels and adjust hub bearings as needed. Inspect and adjust headset and bottom bracket bearings as needed. Lube the chain and appropriate shifter cables and brake cables. Wipe down and clean your frame and wheels.

 $100.00
Deluxe Tune Everything included in the Standard Tune plus; complete removal and cleaning of your drivetrain in our Ultrasonic Parts Washer. Includes labor associated with replacement of any of your drivetrain parts except for bottom bracket installation. Cleaning and polish of the frame and wheels

Click here to watch a video on our Deluxe Bike Tune		 $175.00
Deluxe MTB Tune Everything included in the Standard Tune plus; complete removal and cleaning of your drivetrain in our Ultrasonic Parts Washer. A check and Torque of all suspension pivot hardware to factory specifications. Includes labor associated with the replacement of drivetrain parts, except for the bottom bracket. A complete cleaning and polish of your frame, suspension and wheels. $200.00
Elite Tune Everything included in the Deluxe Tune plus; labor associated with the replacement of all cables/housing, brake pads and bar tape install. $250.00
Elite MTB Tune Everything included in the Deluxe Tune plus; two additional hydraulic services, which can include individual brake bleeds, rear shock air can service or fork lowers service. Replacement of shifter cable/housing and/or dropper post cable/housing included. **Additional labor for complicated internal routing of cables is possible** $350.00
E-Bike Tune All services of a Standard Tune in addition to any computer firmware updates.

E-Bike Policy: Due to increased awareness surrounding e-bike safety, we can only work on e-bikes from brands we sell or have direct access to necessary support services. This includes Specialized, Cannondale, Santa Cruz/Juliana, Cervelo, Scott, Kona and RAD Power Bikes.		 $110.00
Ultrasonic Drivetrain Cleaning The chain, cassette and crankset is removed from your bike and cleaned in our ultrasonic parts washer. Parts are reinstalled with small shifting adjustments as needed. $100.00
 
Bike Suspension + Hydraulic Services

Rear Shock Basic Service Clean and replace the seals and dust wipers in your rear shock's air can. $50.00
Fork Lower Service Clean your fork lowers and replace the dust wiper + foam ring and new oil. $100.00
Brake Bleed Per brake or both $45
The cost for replacement parts are in addition to Suspension and Frame Services.
Suspension work may require us to order parts for your specific bike and affect turnaround times.
 
Bike Frame Services

Rear Linkage Service Disassemble, clean, and inspect all parts, re-grease, loc-tite pivot bolts and torque to specs. $100
Linkage Overhaul Everything in Rear Linkage Service plus cartridge bearing removal and replacement. Estimated labor time is 1.5 - 2 hours. $100/hr
The cost for replacement parts are in addition to Suspension and Frame Services.
Suspension work may require us to order parts for your specific bike and affect turnaround times.
 
Individual Services

Tire/tube install Our best selling service. Under-inflation is the leading cause of flat tires, so keep your tires pumped up to the recommended pressure. $17.50
Wheel True Adjustment of spokes to make a straight and round wheel. $25 to $35
Box for shipping Protect your bike for its trip by professionally packing it in a manufacturer's bike box. $100

settings.title: NEW Bike Buyer 1-Year Discount (updated 9/1/2022): 10% off bike parts, trainers, clothing, accessories and 5% off GarminDiscounts apply for the bike buyer/user only and cannot be combined with other discounts. In-store onlyWe test ride all bikes after service work is completed.We ask you for approval of a $35 allowance above the service estimate to cover parts and labor thatwe discover during your repair. This will help your bike get completed on time.Most parts and added labor are not included in tune packages, suspension, and frame service prices.Work on your bike may require us to order specific parts, which could affect turnaround times.This is especially common with certain suspension work.

settings.text:
• NEW Bike Buyer 1-Year Discount (updated 9/1/2022): 10% off bike parts, trainers, clothing, accessories and 5% off Garmin
    Discounts apply for the bike buyer/user only and cannot be combined with other discounts. In-store only

  • We test ride all bikes after service work is completed.

  • We ask you for approval of a $35 allowance above the service estimate to cover parts and labor that
    we discover during your repair. This will help your bike get completed on time.

  • Most parts and added labor are not included in tune packages, suspension, and frame service prices.

  • Work on your bike may require us to order specific parts, which could affect turnaround times.
    This is especially common with certain suspension work.
